attributes.action: Approach Prince Charles to Source Brexit Negotiators to act on the UKs Behalf .
attributes.background: MPs of all parties Unable to complete task requested

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
